AUROC=0.8200228646088518	AUPRC=0.8001141156626984	Accuracy=0.7206427688504327	MCC=0.46175399235384085	Recall=0.6560509554140127	Precision=0.8284182305630027	f1_score=0.7322274881516588

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.63      0.81      0.71       338
        case       0.83      0.66      0.73       471

   micro avg       0.72      0.72      0.72       809
   macro avg       0.73      0.73      0.72       809
weighted avg       0.74      0.72      0.72       809
